name: Stunt Bike Racing Master
description:
Stunt Bike Racing Master is one of the best Moto stunt racing game in difficult stunt area without road rash game. Bike stunts are a racing and action game in which bike riders and extreme bike stunt with thrilling mission. This game control is design by very unique great controls makes Bike race very exciting and nice time killer! Stunt Bike Racing Master is all about bike balance, skill and control as you guide your rider across the ramps, jumps, barrels and obstacles.

Features:
- Realistic stunt ramps and stunts
- Ultra Smooth and intelligent control
- Multiple Realistic physics based dirt bikes
- Unique, rough and dangerous stunts
- Beautiful 3D graphics and amazing environment
- Challenging stunts game-play
- Very easy to play
